      • addItem

        public POS.DTOs.SaleDTO addItem​(java.lang.String itemIdentifier,
                                int itemQuantity)
        adds an item to the current sale
        Parameters:
        itemIdentifier - the identification of an item
        itemQuantity - the number of items
        Returns:
        returns an object of type SaleDTOwhich contains information about the price of an item, VAT rate and running total

      • discountRequest

        public model.Amount discountRequest​(java.lang.String CustomerID)
        Starts a discount request in current sale
        Parameters:
        CustomerID - is a string that represent the Customer identification
        Returns:
        the object Amount and contains the total price

      • pay

        public model.Amount pay​(model.Amount amtPaid)
        Handles sale payment. Updates the cash register here the payment was performed and records the payment. Calculates change. Prints the receipt.
        Parameters:
        amtPaid - the amount paid
        Returns:
        the amount of change for customer to recieve
